name: @wavelengthusaf/web-components
author: 563 EWS - Wavelength
description: Common component library used by Wavelength developers (NATIVE WEB COMPONENTS)

scripts.build:esm: tsup src/index.ts --format esm --dts --outDir dist/esm && mkdir -p dist/styles/ dist/fonts && cp -R src/styles/ dist/styles/ && cp -R src/fonts/ dist/fonts/
scripts.build:cjs: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs --outDir dist/cjs && mkdir -p dist/styles/ dist/fonts && cp -R src/styles/ dist/styles/ && cp -R src/fonts/ dist/fonts/
scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs
scripts.watch:esm: tsup src/index.ts --format esm --dts --outDir dist/esm --watch && tsc --jsx react-jsx --project ./tsconfig.json
scripts.watch:cjs: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs --outDir dist/cjs --watch && tsc --jsx react-jsx --project ./tsconfig.json
